headline: Heart Fart
description: An abstract drawing posted on Substack combining bold shapes, contrasting colors, and anatomical suggestion, exploring emotional containment and structural form.

fieldDefinitions.resonantThread: The architecture of emotion reveals itself through containment and overflow.
fieldDefinitions.whyItMatters: Serves as a visual expression of emotional mapping in abstract form, contributing to a larger body of creative-expressive documentation.
fieldDefinitions.articleExcerpt: This is a heart, but not a romantic one. It's something that lets off pressure in strange, structured ways.
sourceFragments: Visual style echoes previous post 'Self Portrait'
Possibly influenced by intuitive drawing practice

associatedMedia.description: Photograph of a hand-drawn abstract piece featuring black, magenta, red, and cyan geometric patterning.
